# setTriangleFillMode(_:)

**Instance Method**

Configures how subsequent draw commands rasterize triangle and triangle strip primitives.

## Declaration

```swift
func setTriangleFillMode(_ fillMode: MTLTriangleFillMode)
```

## Parameters

- **fillMode**: [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTriangleFillMode] the render pass applies to draw commands that rasterize triangles or triangle strips.

## Configuring rendering behavior

- **setFrontFacing(_:)**: Configures the vertex winding order that determines which face of a geometric primitive is the front one.
- **setCullMode(_:)**: Controls whether Metal culls front facing primitives, back facing primitives, or culls no primitives at all.
